message.body: 1) i sent you some fb messages! 2) if i go to cvs to buy hygiene-related things and chocolate, will you invest in my purchases?
the kind you eat while you stress about writing a 2 pg paper. why?
I stress too. I am trying to stay current on the chocolate front in case there have been new developments.
understandable! so was that a yes?
Yes it was a yes but i still want to know what kind of chocolate the hip crowd stresses with now-a-days! How am i supposed to be the cool dad?
i will let you know what i end up with! it might be cookies or cereal instead, i'm not sure!
Its all good. Maybe some of that chocolate chip cookie cereal. Cover all your bases at once!
clever! now go look at the messages i sent you! :D
so i spent 31.50 but i saved 19!
